full_description:
Tagg Verve Lite 1.69'' Ultra Large Smart Watch

The Tagg Verve Lite Smart Watch has a 1.69" ultra-large display with 500 NITS brightness and a long-lasting polycarbonate casing. It has cutting-edge sensors and TAGG Sense+ technology for precise data tracking during workouts and other activities. The smartwatch tracks blood oxygen levels, SPO2, heart rate, and sleep in real-time, as well as the female menstrual cycle. Tagg Verve Lite Smart Watch helps you monitor and evaluate your exercises with 25 sports modes and in-app GPS, and smart notifications and reminders keep you connected and encouraged. The Tagg smartwatch features a 10-day battery life and is water-resistant to IPX68 standards. It also provides smart notifications, reminders for water consumption and sedentary breaks, and thorough sleep tracking, which includes deep and light sleep analysis. Because the smartwatch is compatible with both Android and iOS smartphones, the Tagg Verve Lite Smart Watch is a versatile and dependable companion for your everyday activities.

full_description:
TAGG Verve Engage II Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch

The TAGG Verve Engage II Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch is a flexible and convenient smart watch with a 1.72-inch LCD touch display that can be used in a variety of situations. It features Bluetooth 5.1, allowing users to link the watch to their smartphone and directly make or receive calls. Users may also use the watch to manage music and cameras, as well as get smart notifications from applications and messaging. The TAGG Verve Engage II Smart Watch has health monitoring capabilities such as heart rate, blood oxygen level, sleep quality, and more. It also has a pedometer, calorie counter, and step counter to help you track your fitness and performance. The TAGG Verve Engage II Smart Watch can be completely charged in 2 hours and has a battery life of up to 5 days. It also offers a power-saving option to help you get more out of your battery. The watch is 4.5 x 4.5 x 1.1 cm and weighs 110 grams, making it lightweight and pleasant to wear. It syncs data and allows users to change settings with the Smartwatch app. The TAGG Verve Engage II Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch offers a dynamic and practical smart experience.
